message.content: {"given_definition_quality":20,"better_definition":"man; adult male","sentence":"男人在家。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style illustration showing an adult Chinese man standing in a simple home environment, with clear features and relaxed, everyday attire. The background should suggest a modest home interior with warm lighting but minor hints of end-of-world ambiance, such as muted colors or gentle dilapidation. The focus is on the man, who appears calm and at ease, embodying the word '男人'.","sentence_translation":"The man is at home."}
